jobs.title: Paid Search Specialist
jobs.description:
Highrise Marketing is a new performance marketing agency that helps build and manage the online acquisition and retention strategy for well funded startups. All of our clients are out on a mission to disrupt competition and become tomorrow’s household name in their industry. At Highrise we won’t rest until these startups succeed. Do you think you can help us make these brands the next big thing?

Paid Search Specialist 
We’re expanding due to the strong demand for our services from high-growth clients. We’re looking for a Paid Search Specialist to join our team of bright minds in our Mayfair office.

This is not for the fainthearted but is a great opportunity for someone with an adventurous mentality and is ready for the next move. You’ve likely gained good experience agency/client-side and are now looking for an entrepreneurial opportunity to build something new. You will be one of the first hires with the chance to lead the Paid Search team in our fast growing agency. 

You have the opportunity to work very closely with and learn from our founders who have a proven track record in building successful performance marketing campaigns with extremely high visibility. 

Initially you will run point on the Paid Search campaigns of our clients. You can bring your own unique ideas on how to run Search and Shopping campaigns to the table as well as leverage the extensive knowledge of our founders. As you do well and help our clients thrive, you’ll have the opportunity to build your own team of Paid Search superstars within the agency.

What we are looking for is someone who– 

-Has a passion for Digital Marketing and is seized with an untamable desire to learn more and become one of the leading Paid Search specialists in London
-Can develop strategic plans around Paid Search advertising with the capacity to shape and develop concepts that can be applied across different clients
-Works directly with clients in order to help improve their performance MoM
Is keen to become the leader of a high-performing Paid Search team
-Works closely with the existing performance marketing channel specialists to help ensure our clients’ activities are in line with the existing marketing strategy

What we need in a nutshell – 
-At least 2 years experience with running Google Adwords campaigns, preferably in an E-commerce setting
-A strong analytical mindset, great digital nous and who isn’t afraid to jump in feet first
-Is hands on with the ability to work on multiple accounts simultaneously
-Any experience working in startup/ fast growing environment is highly desirable 

Ultimately our success and ability to scale fast is down to an amazing team. We are looking for a confident and adaptable team addition that is willing to go on a journey with us. Our agency is dynamic and fast-paced, but comes with many opportunities to develop and stretch yourself. If all the above strikes a chord with you then we’d love to have a chat.
